00029 #ifndef _POS_TAGGER
00030 #define _POS_TAGGER
00031 
00032 #include <list> 
00033 #include "fries/language.h"
00034 
00035 #define FORCE_NONE   0  // no selection forced
00036 #define FORCE_TAGGER 1  // force select after tagger
00037 #define FORCE_RETOK  2  // force select after retokenization
00038 
00044 
00045 class POS_tagger {
00046 
00047    protected: 
00048       // remember whether retokenization is active
00049       bool retok;
00050       // remember whether the user asked to force only one tag per word
00051       unsigned int force;
00052       // retokenize words that may need it after tagging
00053       void retokenize(std::list<sentence> &);
00054       // force the selection of only one Pos tag per word
00055       void force_select(std::list<sentence> &);
00056 
00057    public:
00058       POS_tagger(bool,unsigned int);
00059       virtual ~POS_tagger() {};
00060       virtual void analyze(std::list<sentence> &)=0;
00061 };
00062 
00063 
00064 #endif
